lemma bound_child_parent_card_state_set_cons_finite: fixes P f assumes "(\<forall>PROB as s. P PROB \<and> finite PROB \<and> as \<in> (valid_plans PROB) \<and> s \<in> (valid_states PROB) \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>as'. (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') \<and> subseq as' as \<and> length as' < f(PROB) ) )" shows "(\<forall>PROB s as. P PROB \<and> finite PROB \<and> as \<in> (valid_plans PROB) \<and> (s \<in> (valid_states PROB)) \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>x. (x \<in> PLS s as) \<and> x < f PROB) )"
